languages.text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts stunned or prone, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.
languages.original_text: При наложении на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, утомления, замешательства или тревожности этот эффект также накладывается на одного случайного противника в радиусе 5 клеток от цели на 1 раунд. Этот же принцип действует при оглушении или опрокидывании противника, но в этом случае дополнительной цели требуется пройти {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever you apply blinded, slowed, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if you apply stunned or prone, but the random target makes a resistance test to avoid the effect.

Whenever you apply blinded, slowed, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if you inflict stunned or prone, but the random target makes a resistance test to avoid the effect.

Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts stunned or prone, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts stunned or prone, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje inflige los estados {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, un enemigo al azar en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo también sufre el mismo efecto durante 1 asalto. Si el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, sucede lo mismo pero el objetivo aleatorio dispone de una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} para resistir el efecto.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: Cuando infliges los estados {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, un enemigo al azar en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo también sufre el mismo efecto durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si infliges {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, sucede lo mismo pero el objetivo aleatorio dispone de una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} para resistir el efecto.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を受けた時、対象の5セル以内にいるランダムな敵1体も1ラウンドの間、その効果を受ける。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}を受けた際も同じ効果が生じるが、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行って、この効果を回避できる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を受けた時、対象の5セル以内にいるランダムな敵1体も1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その効果を受ける。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}を受けた際も同じ効果が生じるが、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行って、この効果を回避できる。

{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を受けた時、対象の5セル以内にいるランダムな敵1体も1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その効果を受ける。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}を受けた際も同じ効果が生じるが、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行って、この効果を回避できる。

languages.text: 每当此角色施加{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}迟缓{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果时，目标周围5格内随机一名敌人也会获得同样效果，持续一轮。此效果对{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态也同样生效，但该随机目标会进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，尝试抵抗此效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: 每当你施加{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}迟缓{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果时，目标周围5格内随机一名敌人也会获得同样效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果对{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态也同样生效，但该随机目标会进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，尝试抵抗此效果。

每当此角色施加{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}迟缓{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果时，目标周围5格内随机一名敌人也会获得同样效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果对{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态也同样生效，但该随机目标会进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，尝试抵抗此效果。

languages.text: Wenn der Charakter die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g} verursacht, erhält ein zufälliger Feind innerhalb von 5 Feldern um das Ziel diesen Effekt ebenfalls 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. Dasselbe geschieht, wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} verursacht, aber das Ziel kann den Effekt mit einer erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} vermeiden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn du die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}überrascht{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g} anwendest, erhält ein zufälliger Gegner innerhalb von 5 Feldern des Ziels diesen Effekt ebenfalls für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Dasselbe geschieht, wenn du {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zufügst, aber das zufällige Ziel macht eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}, um den Effekt zu vermeiden.

languages.text: Lorsque le personnage inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, un ennemi aléatoire situé à 5 cases ou moins de la cible bénéficie également de cet effet pendant 1 round. Il en va de même si le personnage inflige {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, mais la cible aléatoire doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} pour échapper à cet effet.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque vous appliquez l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, un ennemi aléatoire situé à moins de 5 cases de la cible bénéficie également de cet effet pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Il en va de même si vous infligez {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, mais la cible aléatoire doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} pour échapper à cet effet.

languages.text: При наложении на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, утомления, замешательства или тревожности этот эффект также накладывается на одного случайного противника в радиусе 5 клеток от цели на 1 раунд. Этот же принцип действует при оглушении или опрокидывании противника, но в этом случае дополнительной цели требуется пройти {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, fatigued, perplexed, or disturbed effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts stunned or prone, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.

traits.locale_text: При наложении на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g} этот эффект также накладывается на одного случайного противника в радиусе 5 клеток от цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот же принцип действует при {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывании{/g} противника, но в этом случае дополнительной цели требуется пройти {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}.

При наложении на противника {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g} этот эффект также накладывается на одного случайного противника в радиусе 5 клеток от цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот же принцип действует при {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывании{/g} противника, но в этом случае дополнительной цели требуется пройти {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}.

languages.text: Karakter; {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g} etkilerinden birini her uyguladığında o hedefe en fazla 5 hücre uzaktaki rastgele bir düşman da 1 turluğuna aynı etkiye maruz kalır. Karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} etkisi oluşturduğunda da aynı şey olur ancak rastgele hedef, etkiden sakınmak için {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character applies {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 round. The same happens if the character inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.
